name: Twins (feri)
description:
TWINS - GMTK2021 - Joined Together

This is a two player co-op game about Twins which are separated from each other. They must work together to solve puzzles, kill enemies while managing resources through a Space-Time Backpack in which they can put ammunition, guns and key Items to use or to let the other sibling use.

Player 1 controls.

Player 2 controls.

Credits:

Zurioko(Artist): https://zurioko.itch.io/

dudunab(Designer): https://dudunab.itch.io/

feri(Programmer): https://feri-sharp.itch.io/

Have Fun!
